video.title: Giada at Home
video.synopsis: Giada De Laurentiis shares recipes and entertaining tips with a laid-back California flair, from game-day snacks to dinner parties to fusion cuisine.

episodes.synopsis: Bringing her daughter and her friends into the kitchen, Giada teaches them to make green spears and ham, pizza popcorn and other dishes.
episodes.title: Kids in the Kitchen

episodes.synopsis: Borrowing recipes from her restaurant in Las Vegas, Giada prepares Italian dishes with a California flair, such as chicken Marsala meatballs.
episodes.title: Giada's Vegas Favorites

episodes.synopsis: After touring Koreatown in Los Angeles, Giada makes her own Korean barbecue beef, spicy sesame bok choy and a kimchi pancake.
episodes.title: Giada's Korean Barbecue

episodes.synopsis: Giada prepares several fix-them-in-minutes dishes, including kale and hummus salad, Calabrian chili pasta and red snapper open-faced sandwiches.
episodes.title: Quick and Easy Favorites

episodes.synopsis: Giada's Aunt Raffy helps her whip up some family favorites, including pizza rustica, escarole pie and pizza with Buzz, a favorite of Raffy's husband.
episodes.title: Cooking with Raffy and Buzz

episodes.synopsis: Inviting friends for a tasting, Giada serves samples of dishes such as crispy fig and Gorgonzola ravioli and pancetta, lettuce and tomato sandwiches.
episodes.title: Ciao Chow

episodes.synopsis: A Halloween party at Giada's features white chocolate caramel apples, peanut butter candy-filled zeppole and chocolate, almond and cherry brittle.
episodes.title: Halloween Goodies

episodes.synopsis: Giada cooks up a Thanksgiving feast with smashed root vegetables, bacon-bourbon Brussels sprouts skewers and a turkey breast version of porchetta.
episodes.title: Giving Thanks

episodes.synopsis: Invited to an adult slumber party-themed comedy show, Giada brings bloody mary dip, eggs Benedict deviled eggs and silver dollar pancake sandwiches.
episodes.title: Slumber Party

episodes.synopsis: For a traditional Italian Feast of the Seven Fishes Christmas Eve dinner, Giada prepares tangerine and herb branzino and crispy oysters Rockefeller.
episodes.title: An Italian Christmas

episodes.synopsis: It's a culinary day at the spa for Giada and her friends with a menu featuring farro and kale salad, almond and peach toasts, and peas and carrots.
episodes.title: Garden Spa Day

episodes.synopsis: Giada's regal desserts include walnut rosemary tart with orange Chantilly cream, and espresso cake with Tuscan liquor buttercream and caramel glass.
episodes.title: Festive Desserts

episodes.synopsis: Giada reveals how to take simple dishes such as penne with pork ragout and New York strip steak with red wine butter to restaurant-quality heights.
episodes.title: Restaurant Tips
